transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello Kuldeep ji baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan Kuldeep ji baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Haan Kuldeep ji se baat kar raha tha senior manager India Mart office se.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Kuldeep ji aapki Malvika se baat hui hogi shayad na aapne uski call ka ek feedback diya aisa negative koi issue aa raha hai kya sir call mein koi matlab Malvika se baat karne mein koi problem aa rahi thi?
Customer: [inaudible] kya bol rahe hain sir?
Customer: Madam meri jo feedback diya hai. Not satisfied maine to iska feedback diya. Maine to kal ke aaj maine feedback diya.
Executive: Aawaz aawaz kat rahi hai sir thoda sa ek bar dobara bolenge?
Customer: Madam meri service ka feedback diya hai.
Executive: Malvika se aapki baat hui hogi na baat karne ke baad account manager ka feedback whatsapp pe gaya hoga to wo dissatisfied mark kiya hai na aapne?
Customer: Not satisfied kiya hai.
Executive: Aapne nahi kiya?
Customer: Not satisfied kiya hai maine.
Executive: Haan not satisfied hi aaya hai sir mere paas. Not satisfied hi aaya hai sir mere paas.
Customer: Haan. Haan to wahi puch raha tha sir koi issue aa raha hai kya sir not satisfied kiya hai?
Customer: Main service se satisfied nahi hu isliye not satisfied kiya hai.
Executive: Company se satisfied nahi hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Kyu sir kya issue aa raha hai bataiye?
Customer: Issue kya hai sir aapke manager baat nahi karte uske baad koi nahi hai mere koi. Ab unhone jo mere ko do inquiry bheji thi lekin ye fir main kya karu batao na.
Executive: Inquiry wagera nahi aa pa rahi proper. Nahi hai ab chalo theek hai nahi hai koi baat nahi ab active jab honge na tab hamare active koi inquiry dikhegi hame.
Executive: Accha matlab inquiry wagera apne kaam ki nahi aa pa rahi hoti. Sir aapke paas paas aadmi aapko net karke inquiry aapke inquiry aapki hai aur paise dene ke baad bhi aapke aapke bhi manager dekhne nahi aata ki ha sir ye inquiry hai na nahi hai. Hmm. Ye sab cheezein hai sir paise deke humne laga diya to laga diya humne aise hi ab. Nahi bas sir baith lete hain sari cheezein ek bar samajh lete hain abhi aap agar abhi mujhe lagta hai aap shayad online nahi aa payenge aap ek bar sir kal ka mujhe koi ek bar time do subah ka kal ek bar aap agar online aa pao baith ke sir one on one ek bar baat karte hain matlab kya dikkat kahan aa rahi hai kya hum better kar sakte hain apne side se kya issue aa raha hai?
Customer: 11 baje kal kal 11 baje sir ek bar aapko call karta hu sir 11 baje ek bar video meeting pe baat karte hain.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Video meeting pe aa jayenge sir online?
Customer: Haan haan bol dijiye. Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir kal 11 baje ek bar aapko call karta hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with the service provided by IndiaMART.

- No proper inquiries are being received.

- Manager does not address concerns.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting to discuss issues.

- Scheduled a video meeting for the next day at 11 AM.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for the next day at 11 AM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- inquiries, feedback, service, video meeting
